executable.title: AAD Image Filter
executable.description: This is a CLI module that can be bundled in the MS Lesion Track extension. The goal here is to provide a brain tissue segmentation tool in order to provide a brain mask for other segmentation procedures. The MS Lesion Track segmentation modules use T1 white matter masks directly as input parameter, and this module could help you to create the white matter mask needed.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo), Luiz Otavio Murta Junior (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CAPES, a Brazilian Finantial Agency

double.name: condutance
double.label: Condutance
double.description: A integer value for edge preservation adjustment.

integer.name: iterations
integer.label: Number of Iterations
integer.description: A integer value that defines the number of iterations.

double.name: timeStep
double.label: Time Step
double.description: A double value that regulates the numerical stability of the algorithm. It is safe to maintain the upper limit with the formulation given by Anisotropic Diffusion algorithm (See GradientAnisotropiDiffusionImageFilter in ITK documentation).

double.name: q
double.label: Anomalous Parameter
double.description: A double value that defines the q-Gaussian probability distribution function which is convoluated in each neighborhood in the image.
